slowQueries.query:

    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name TE

    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    resource_

-- Recurrence rules table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS recurrence_rules (
    booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES booki

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_exceptions_booking_date 
    ON exceptions (booking_id, except_date)

-- Exceptions table

frequentQueries.query:
SELECT id, start_time, end_time
      FROM bookings
      WHERE resource_id = $1::uuid
        AND time_range && tstzran
SELECT $2 FROM ONLY "public"."resources" x WHERE "id" OPERATOR(pg_catalog.=) $1 FOR KEY SHARE OF x
